name: harbor-marks-subgraph
description: Subgraph for tracking Harbor Marks in Maiden Voyage

scripts.deploy:marks:production: cp subgraph.production.yaml subgraph.yaml && graph codegen && graph build && graph deploy --node https://api.studio.thegraph.com/deploy/ --deploy-key $GRAPH_DEPLOY_KEY harbor-marks
scripts.deploy:marks:production:version: cp subgraph.production.yaml subgraph.yaml && graph codegen && graph build && graph deploy --node https://api.studio.thegraph.com/deploy/ --deploy-key $GRAPH_DEPLOY_KEY harbor-marks --version-label
scripts.deploy:marks:test: cp subgraph.test.yaml subgraph.yaml && graph codegen && graph build && graph deploy --node https://api.studio.thegraph.com/deploy/ --deploy-key $GRAPH_DEPLOY_KEY harbor-marks-test
scripts.deploy:marks:test:version: cp subgraph.test.yaml subgraph.yaml && graph codegen && graph build && graph deploy --node https://api.studio.thegraph.com/deploy/ --deploy-key $GRAPH_DEPLOY_KEY harbor-marks-test --version-label
scripts.//: SAIL PRICE/PNL SUBGRAPH (sail-tokens) - ALWAYS uses subgraph.sail.*
scripts.deploy:sail:production: cp subgraph.sail.production.yaml subgraph.yaml && graph codegen && graph build && graph deploy --node https://api.studio.thegraph.com/deploy/ --deploy-key $GRAPH_DEPLOY_KEY sail-tokens
scripts.deploy:sail:production:version: cp subgraph.sail.production.yaml subgraph.yaml && graph codegen && graph build && graph deploy --node https://api.studio.thegraph.com/deploy/ --deploy-key $GRAPH_DEPLOY_KEY sail-tokens --version-label
scripts.deploy:sail:test: cp subgraph.sail.test.yaml subgraph.yaml && graph codegen && graph build && graph deploy --node https://api.studio.thegraph.com/deploy/ --deploy-key $GRAPH_DEPLOY_KEY sail-tokens
scripts.deploy:sail:test:version: cp subgraph.sail.test.yaml subgraph.yaml && graph codegen && graph build && graph deploy --node https://api.studio.thegraph.com/deploy/ --deploy-key $GRAPH_DEPLOY_KEY sail-tokens --version-label
scripts.use:local: cp subgraph.local.yaml subgraph.yaml 2>/dev/null || echo 'No local config found'
